name: Feedbacks and Reviews
author: Pasquale Bucci

sections.description:
With this plugin you can build your feedbacks and reviews system, in minutes:

  1. Save precious time with the shortcodes.
  2. Total control. All users feedbacks are in pending review, so you can edit all you want, before publishing.
  3. 1 rating criterion with lite version. All rating criterions for feedbacks you desire, with Premium version!
  4. Slider Shortcode. Only for Premium users, we provide a shortcode that put your Feedbacks like a slider, in a page.
  5. Stars in Google. Automatically transmit your ratings to Google and show your stars in Google serps (Premium version).
  6. As Premium user, you will receive updates and priority support for one year!

Compare Free and Premium plugin.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Download and install the Plugin
  2. Upload the plugin folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Read the online Documentation.

short_description: The best Feedbacks and Reviews plugin for WordPress!
